song.title: Funky ST Machine
song.info:
This is my second song for ATARI STe. It's 8-channels digital music (min. 1Mb RAM to load/play). Recorded from real hardware (ATARI 1040 STe 4Mb) with 50kHz quality. Radical STe stereo replaced by 60-40/40-60. *NO* further mastering.
Made in 10.2011 for Silly Venture 2011 multichannel digital music compo. [3rd place]
Hardware used while composing: - Atari 520ST 4Mb + HxC USB (must work also on 1Mb) - Atari 1040STe 4Mb + satan-disk 2Gb (must work also on 1Mb, then probably from FDD only) - Yamaha E423 synthesizer - tested on Falcon 030 14Mb with 4Gb CF card (must work also on 4Mb)
Software used: - Hex-Tracker v0.843 - Octalyser v0.96 - tested and recorded from MOD-PLAYER 1.0 by Christian Dahl (50kHz sound-quality).
Respect to software makers: Paulo Simoes, The Black Lotus, New Core, Reward, Christian Dahl. Greetz to 505 and YM-Rockerz.
